name: Olympus Odyssey
description:
Epic Odyssey battles.  

Controls : WASD arrows keys,  Left mouse to shoot and rotate gun. Right mouse to reload gun ammo. 
Gamepad :  left stick  to move and shoot with X.( no gun rotation for the moment).  

Story : Olympus is sent over another galaxy to fight against the cubes hordes. 

Genre: shooter, Epic battles. 

Made for the Gam Jam with theme Courage and  the limitation " Not on Planet Earth".
